column5: Hi Fellow members,  Would like to get some information in Bayfront Park or Pier 4. which one has the deeper area? I would like to target sheephead and heard they fight like crazy.  Thanks in advance!

I can't help you with those locations I've never caught one there, but if you have a boat (or don't) Dunnville is full of them, near the bridges and in Erie I've caught a handful of 10 pounders out that way

great link Dave posted. remember, those numbers are in meters.  the point at pier 4, where it drops off to 9m / 10m is a good spot for drum. the corner at Canada Marine Discovery Centre is also a good spot as it has good depth.  i've found the big drum in the harbour stay close to deep water...

great link Dave posted. remember, those numbers are in meters.  the point at pier 4, where it drops off to 9m / 10m is a good spot for drum. the corner at Canada Marine Discovery Centre is also a good spot as it has good depth.  i've found the big drum in the harbour stay close to deep water... Thanks for explaining about the numbers, Steve.  I was just about to ask.  And yes, a terrific link!
